author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow connection level errors (such as connection refused) to propogate upwards
properly.
* context.c
(read_from_connection): Assume len is only initialized if status is SUCCESS.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add serf_request_get_conn() to permit access to the connection from the
request object.
* serf.h
(serf_request_get_conn): Declare.
* context.c
(serf_request_get_conn): Implement.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Allow apps a chance to read from a closed socket if there's stuff to read
(like an error message explaining why the socket got closed!).
(Fixes ra_serf and commit test #27 on Mac OS X.)
* context.c
(process_connection): Reorder priority of looking at the poll flags to
put read first in line rather than triggering on POLLHUP first.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix IPv6 connections by correctly passing along the address family.
This lets us connect to localhost when IPv6 is enabled.
* context.c
(open_connections): Use the address's family instead of APR_INET.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix up two minor buglets seen with Visual Studio 2005.
* context.c
(read_from_connection): Allocate the stream from the correct pool to align
with the write_to_connection logic.
(serf_connection_close): Do not worry about the stream bucket; it was
allocated from the pool's allocator and has likely already been tossed
by the time we're invoking.
